text: Aisa shaks jo pehlay murda tha phir hum ney uss ko zinda ker diya aur hum ney uss ko aik aisa noor dey diya kay woh iss ko liye huye aadmiyon mein chalta phirta hai. Kiya aisa shaks uss shaks ki tarah ho sakta hai? Jo tareekiyon say nikal hi nahi pata. Issi tarah kafiron ko unn kay aemaal khushnuma maloom hua kertay hain
